overview: Legendary jazz and reggae guitarist Ernest Ranglin is honored by an all-star cast of musicians--including friends Phil Chen, Robbie Krieger, and Elliot Easton--as they perform the songs "3 Pope," "Grandfather Clock," "My Boy Lollipop," "Hurts to Be Alone," "Ball of Fire," and many others.
title: Ernest Ranglin: Order of Distinction
